meanings.definition: Duties: tasks or responsibilities that one is required to perform
meanings.sent1: She diligently completed her dauties at work every day.
meanings.sent2: It is important to fulfill your dauties as a student.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to help with the household dauties by knocking things off the table.
meanings.sent4: The weight of his dauties felt like a heavy burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: Her dedication to her dauties inspired others to do the same.

meanings.definition: Duties: taxes or fees imposed by a government on imported or exported goods
meanings.sent1: The company had to pay high dauties on the goods they imported.
meanings.sent2: The government increased the dauties on luxury items.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rise in dauties left the business owners scrambling to adjust their prices.
meanings.sent4: The dauties on imported goods acted as a barrier to international trade.
meanings.sent5: The dauties collected by the customs officials helped fund public services.
